import React from 'react' import {Store} from '../Store' import { useContext } from 'react' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container'; import CardHeader from 'react-bootstrap/esm/CardHeader'; import CardBody from 'react-bootstrap/esm/CardBody'; import ListGroupItem from 'react-bootstrap/esm/ListGroupItem'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Col'; export default function OrderScreen() { const {state , dispatch} = useContext(Store) const {cart} = state const {order} = cart return ( <>

Order {order._id}

Shipping Name :  {order.shippingAdress.fullname} Adress :  {order.shippingAdress.adress} {(!order.isDelivered) ? "Not Delivered" : " Delivered" } Payment Method :  {order.paymentMethod} {(!order.isPaid) ? "Not Paid" : "Paid" } items { order.ordereItems.map((x)=>{ return    {x.name}

{x.quantity}

{ x.quantity * x.price}dh

 }) } Edit ) }
